text: But Naaman was wroth, and went away, and said, Behold, I thought, He will surely come out to me, and stand, and call on the name of the LORD his God, and strike his hand over the place, and recover the leper.5.11 I thought: Heb. I said5.11 I thoughtâ€¦: or, I said with myself, He will surely come out, etc: Heb. I said5.11 strike: Heb. move up and down
